other_tests.findings: A homozygous G to A point mutation at position /H110011 of the splice donor site of intron 5 (g.IVS5 /H110011G3A) was detected in both patients, while a monoallelic mutation was found in their parents.
A 191-bp fragment was found in the patients and both 351- and 191-bp fragments were present in their father, confirming deletion of exon 5 in the 191-bp fragment.
FNA of the thyroid nodules showed follicular cells with atypia.
Showed marked improvement with only a faint activity in the thyroid bed without evidence of any other abnormal uptake in the previously described skeletal sites.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Prior to this, other diagnostic WBS had revealed several foci in the neck, skull, abdomen, and right upper femur.

other_tests.findings: Confirmed diagnosis of metastatic follicular thyroid cancer.
